Package repast.simphony.visualization.grid

Class GridShape

java.lang.Object
org.piccolo2d.PNode
repast.simphony.visualization.grid.GridShape
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable, Serializable, Cloneable
public class GridShape extends org.piccolo2d.PNode
Grid shaped PNode that can convert a point to row, column coordinates.
